description:
Welcome to the Math Constants Cipher challenge!
        
        We've encrypted a flag using a custom algorithm based on mathematical constants.
        The algorithm uses:
        1. Substitution using digits of e, π, and φ (golden ratio)
        2. Position-based transformations with a secret key
        3. Interleaving of characters
        4. Base64 encoding
        
        Your task is to reverse the algorithm and recover the original flag.
        The flag format is STURSEC{...}
        
        Good luck!
